Description: Navigating a successful career in cancer research, whether in academia, industry, or government, can be daunting. Establishing a team of mentors to guide you along the way is an essential step as you begin your journey. In this highly interactive session, cancer researchers with a strong commitment to mentoring and supporting the professional development of cancer research investigators, will share their knowledge and experience leading mentoring teams. Hear their stories and learn how to build and take full advantage of an effective mentoring team, whether you are a trainee, an early-stage investigator or a later stage investigator considering a career change.
Location: Junior Ballroom F - Rosen Centre Hotel
SearchResultBody: PAS07. Building an Effective Mentorship Team:  Essential Strategies at Every Stage in Your Career

Title: Building an Effective Mentorship Team:  Essential Strategies at Every Stage in Your Career
